name: Raid on LudumBay
description:
*Please run full screen!*

Created alone in 72 hours, here is Raid on LudumBay, a helicopter shooter game based on Will Wright's Raid on Bungeling Bay and Sim Copter.

You must keep the LudumBay city and its citizens alive by destroying the tanks and rescuing the citizens!

Land on buildings roof to pick up the citizens and bring them back on the ship to get rescue money. Alternatively, since you are a taxi-copter, you can transport them where they want (follow the arrow) to gain extra money. Make sure you have enough gas !

Land on the ship to buy ammo and refill your gas tank.

TO WIN THE GAME: Destroy all the enemy factories. Make sure to buy enough gas !

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

CONTROLS:
-----------
MOVE & TURN : A,W,S,D
FLY UP/DOWN: SHIFT , Z
TURBO: HOLD CAPS LOCK (Consume more gas)
SWITCH WEAPON: 1=Missile   2=Bullets
UNHOOK BRICK: U    (Toggle the hook first)
CHANGE VIEW ISO/FPS: H
FIRE WEAPON: SPACE
STRAFE: Q,E

*Please run full screen!*
